flawed_nl_solution:
Lee currently earns $60000 / 12 months = $<<60000/12=500>>500 per month.
The engagement ring will cost him 2 * $500 = $<<2*500=1000>>1000.
This means that it will take Lee $1000 / $1000 = <<1000/1000=1>>1 months to save enough money before he can propose.
#### 1

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5000, not 500. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
